desc: We make golf shoes for people that are fed up with golf shoes. TRUEs are comfortable, light weight, and weatherproof so you can Enjoy The Walk on or off the course.

layout.text:
TRUElinkswear crafts naturally comfortable golf equipments that transcends the golf courses.
Using only the finest materials, our shoes protect you from the elements and help you enjoy the walk.
As a collective we aim to inspire each other in the spirit of camaraderie and wellness, always chasing par.
#enjoythewalk
